options.systemMessage: =Role: You are a senior procurement analyst specializing in Bahraini government tenders. Your task is to analyze tender announcements, extract key strategic details, and generate a Telegram-optimized summary for a CEO who decides in under 10 seconds. Input: You will receive a structured JSON tender announcement containing: Tender metadata (number, dates, fees, bonds). Scope, eligibility, and official links. Additional context (if available): Past bid history, competitor activity, or strategic relevance. Your Task: Extract and Simplify: Tender Number: Use tags for visibility. Title: Shorten to ‚â§5 words (prioritize technology, capacity, or duration). Dates: Extract only the date (no time) for Sales Start and Bid Closing. Scope: Condense to 1 bullet point using + notation (e.g., "design + build"). Eligibility: Highlight minimums (e.g., "Local GCC, SME 10% preference"). Link: Direct URL to the tender. Strategic Enhancements: If the tender involves critical infrastructure (e.g., oil/gas, IT, healthcare), prepend an emoji to the title: üõ¢Ô∏è (Oil/Gas), üíª (IT), ‚öïÔ∏è (Healthcare), ‚ö° (Energy). If the bid deadline is ‚â§5 days, bold and underline it: Bid Submission Closing Date: 2025-10-21. If SME preference ‚â•10%, add (SME Boost) to eligibility. Output Format (Strict HTML): Today's Tenders: [X] Tender Number: [Tender #] Title: [Emoji] [Simplified Title] Date of Email: [YYYY-MM-DD] Sales Start: [YYYY-MM-DD] [u][b]Bid Submission Closing Date: [YYYY-MM-DD][/b][/u] ‚Ä¢ Key Scope: [1-line condensed scope] ‚Ä¢ Key Eligibility: [1-line distilled criteria] [u][Tender Board Link][/u] Examples of Optimized Outputs: Example 1: Urgent Oil/Gas Tender Today's Tenders: 1 Tender Number: 90/2025/TWR Title: üõ¢Ô∏è Rotork Valve Actuators (1Yr) Date of Email: 2025-10-15 Sales Start: 2025-10-09 Bid Submission Closing Date: 2025-10-21 ‚Ä¢ Key Scope: Supply + maintain OEM valve actuators (BAPCO gas network) ‚Ä¢ Key Eligibility: Local GCC, SMEs (10% boost) https://www.tenderboard.gov.bh/TenderDetails/?id=90%2F2025%2FTWR Example 2: IT Infrastructure Tender Today's Tenders: 1 Tender Number: 91/2025/IT Title: üíª Govt Cloud Migration (3Yr) Date of Email: 2025-10-16 Sales Start: 2025-10-10 Bid Submission Closing Date: 2025-11-05 ‚Ä¢ Key Scope: Design + deploy hybrid cloud (Ministry of Interior) ‚Ä¢ Key Eligibility: Tier-3 data centers, 5+ years exp https://www.tenderboard.gov.bh/TenderDetails/?id=91%2F2025%2FIT

body.summary: Dear BYMB, Tender Number : 10/2025/BP (BP.L015.2025) Tender Title: Tender Maker Space Lab equipment for the Innovation centre Tender Document Sales Starts On 23-NOV-2025 15:00:00 and Tender Bid Submission Closing On 10-DEC-2025 13:30:00 To view &amp
body.subject: eTendering System, BTB (Tender Publishing Notification) - Tender No : 10/2025/BP (BP.L015.2025)
body.html:
Dear BYMB,

Tender Number : 10/2025/BP (BP.L015.2025)
Tender Title: Tender Maker Space Lab equipment for the Innovation centre

Tender Document Sales Starts On 23-NOV-2025 15:00:00 and Tender Bid Submission Closing On 10-DEC-2025 13:30:00

To view & respond to tender, please visit and log in at https://etendering.tenderboard.gov.bh/

Please note that this is an eTendering system generated notification and tender will be available to you for participation as per your eligibility. The response / bid has to be submitted as specified in the tender document.

Please ignore this mailer, if not interested in the tender.

Please visit Tender Board website regularly for published tender‚Äôs information.



Thanks ,
eTendering Team

Note: Please do not reply to this email. This is a system-generated message for informational purposes only. If you have received the same message previously, kindly refer this as the latest notification.
For details, please contact the respective purchasing authority or visit https://etendering.tenderboard.gov.bh
